org.crosswire.common.config.swing
接口 ButtonPaneListener

所有已知实现类：
AbstractConfigEditor, AdvancedConfigEditor, TreeConfigEditor
public interface ButtonPaneListener

A listener for button presses in a ButtonPane.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors.

方法摘要
 void applyPressed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ev)
          Someone has pressed apply
 void cancelPressed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ev)
          Someone has pressed cancel
 void okPressed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ev)
          Someone has pressed OK
 

方法详细信息

okPressed

Someone has pressed OK

参数：
ev - The button press event

void cancelPressed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ev)
Someone has pressed cancel

参数：

void applyPressed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ev)
Someone has pressed apply

参数：
